稒字的基本解释

稒
gū
〔稒阳〕古县名，在今中国内蒙古自治区包头市附近。

稒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gù］
［《廣韻》古暮切，去暮，見。］
(1)稒阳。古县名。西汉置，属五原郡。治所在今内蒙古自治区包头市东。东汉废。
(2)稒阳。古要塞名。战国魏惠王十九年筑。故址在今内蒙古自治区固阳县附近。

稒字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　稒； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页854第30
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?古慕切，音顧。縣名。【前漢·地理志】五原郡有稒陽縣。

稒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
稒字的起名意思

暂无。

稒
Basic explanation of words
稒
gū
[Yiyang] Ancient county name, near Baotou City in the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region of China today.
稒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gù］
["Guangyun" Gu Mu cut, go to Mu, see you. ]
(1) Zhenyang. Ancient county name. Set in the Western Han Dynasty, it belongs to Wuyuan County. It was located in the east of Baotou City, Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region. The Eastern Han Dynasty wasted.
(2) Yiyang. Ancient fortress name. Built in the 19th year of King Wei Hui in the Warring States Period. The former site was near Guyang County in present-day Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
稒
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [He Zi Department] 　稒; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 854 30
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Gu Muqie, Yin Gu. County name. [Pre-Han Geography] There is Zhenyang County in Wuyuan County.
